name: Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt
description: The Nike Men's Dri-FIT Legend Training T-Shirt is designed for high-performance workouts and everyday wear. Made with Dri-FIT technology, this t-shirt wicks away sweat to keep you dry and comfortable. The lightweight, breathable fabric ensures maximum comfort during intense training sessions. This t-shirt features a classic fit with a ribbed crew neck and short sleeves for a comfortable and unrestricted range of motion. Available in various colors, it combines style and functionality for athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

name: Adidas Men's Essentials 3-Stripes T-Shirt
description: The Adidas Men's Essentials 3-Stripes T-Shirt combines classic style with modern comfort. Crafted from soft, breathable cotton fabric, this t-shirt features the iconic 3-Stripes design along the shoulders and sleeves. The regular fit and ribbed crew neck ensure a comfortable fit for everyday wear. This versatile t-shirt is perfect for both casual outings and active days, offering a timeless look with Adidas' signature quality and comfort.
